headline: Assessing Zoetis (ZTS) Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength And Longer Term Weakness
summary: Zoetis stock snapshot after recent performance data Zoetis (ZTS) is back on investors’ radar after recent performance data showed a 2.3% one-day move, with gains over the past week, month and past 3 months alongside a negative 1-year total return. See our latest analysis for Zoetis. At a share price of US$128.66, Zoetis has seen short term share price strength with a 1 month share price return of 3.72%. However, the 1 year total shareholder return of 22.55% decline points to longer term...
